I am a PhD student working for Ifremer and Institut Agro (Rennes). I am finishing my last year of PhD and I am mainly interested in quantitative ecology and statistical modeling with application in fisheries science. I actually develop methods for mapping fish populations in space and time by combining multiple heterogeneous data sources. You'll find plenty of details in the following pages!
